attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The e-petitions system launched in November 2006. It is currently in a public "beta test".

Despite the weight of public opinion demonstrated by around 1.25 million people (to date) signing up to a particular petition, a government minister has announced it was created by a prat and implied the system has no teeth.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
